DeathSteel::

He was stopped by the door. He turned and walked back to 
Perceptor. "Why did you stop me? I want to fight for our leader. Why 
stop me from helping?" his rage showing in his optics, but his face 
showing restraint. 



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Perceptor:
> 
> "Doors LOCK UP!!!" commanded Perceptor. The doors of corritor shut 
> up not allowing anyone come in or left the area
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <logomorph@h...> wrote:
> > DeathSteel::
> > 
> > "What?!" his optics wide. "Didn't come here to join us? Then why? 
> To 
> > gain rule over us?" He drew his plasma blaster. "I'll make sure 
> the 
> > new comer is short lived if that is the case. " and started to 
> storm 
> > off down the hall. 
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > Perceptor:
> > > 
> > > "True, true"replied Perceptor "But something told me that this 
> new 
> > > comer didn't come to join us..."
> > > 
> > >
